definition: silk/thread/trace/(cuisine) shreds or julienne strips/CL:條|条[tiao2]/classifier: a thread (of cloud, smoke etc), a bit, an iota, a hint (of sth) etc
to join things together by fixing them in place at one or more points/to nail/to pin/to staple/to sew on
nail/to follow closely/to keep at sb (to do sth)/variant of 盯[ding1]
a "screw that never rusts" — sb who selflessly and wholeheartedly serves the Communist Party, like Lei Feng 雷鋒|雷锋[Lei2 Feng1], to whom the metaphor is attributed
pinyin: yong3 bu4 sheng1 xiu4 de5 luo2 si1 ding1

sentences.english: The screws also promote a particular sense of perspective.
sentences.chinese: 螺丝钉还赋予我们一种从整体出发来看问题的意识。

sentences.english: Screws have been used as fasteners for a long time.
sentences.chinese: 螺丝钉已经被当作牢系工具使用有很长的一段时间。

sentences.english: Doctors took X-rays of his chest that showed his insides littered with screws.
sentences.chinese: 医生通过X光片发现他的内脏里到处都是螺丝钉。

sentences.english: Remove 2 Philips screws on each side of the bumper in wheel wells.
sentences.chinese: 删除2飞利浦螺丝钉，每边的保险杠在车轮水井。

sentences.english: Attach the stand to the book using screws.
sentences.chinese: 用螺丝钉把鞋撑固定在书本上。

sentences.english: The worker felt for a few screws in a tool box .
sentences.chinese: 这位工人在工具箱里摸来摸去找几个螺丝钉。

sentences.english: This packet is supposed to contain ten screws, but it's two short.
sentences.chinese: 这包应装有十个螺丝钉，可是短立芙个。

sentences.english: I removed the last of the screws and took the back off the machine.
sentences.chinese: 我旋下最后一颗螺丝钉，打开了机器的后盖。

sentences.english: To hide a fault with a lie is to replace a bolt by a hole.
sentences.chinese: 用浮言掩饰错误，是取下螺丝钉而留下一个孔。

sentences.english: Working in big companies is similar to the role played by a screw in a big machine.
sentences.chinese: 在大公司工作的人就像是大机器上的一颗螺丝钉。

sentences.english: The brackets want an extra screw.
sentences.chinese: 托架需要再加一个螺丝钉。

sentences.english: Turn the screw to the right to tighten it.
sentences.chinese: 将螺丝钉往右扭转，使它钉紧。

sentences.english: They have screwed up the door so that it cannot be opened.
sentences.chinese: 他们已用螺丝钉把门钉住，所以门打不开丁。

sentences.english: Fix the top lath of the curtain onto the roller with the screws and washers provided.
sentences.chinese: 用提供的螺丝钉和垫片把卷帘顶部板条固定在卷轴上。

sentences.english: In 2 cases pseudoarticulation formed due to loosening of the screw. Healing occurred after bone grafting.
sentences.chinese: 术后2例因螺丝钉松动，假关节形成，行植骨后愈合。

sentences.english: If any screw of the school chair is missing, the student sitting on it will be fined.
sentences.chinese: 椅子上的螺丝钉如果不见了，学生是要被罚钱的。

definition: nut (female component of nut and bolt)
nut (female component of nut and bolt)
bolt (male component of nut and bolt)/screw
nut (female component of nut and bolt)
nut (female component of nut and bolt)
